docs.title: AI Builder Roadmap (8 Weeks → 12 Months)
docs.text: Goal: Explore for 8 weeks with objective evidence, then commit to one lane (LLM/RAG & AI Search or Recommenders or Vision) and scale it for 12 months.

docs.title: Phase 0 — Week 1–2: Foundations
docs.text:
• Two sklearn notebooks (classification + regression) with clean metrics.
  • Package skeleton, tests, lint, CI green.
  • Short public post.

docs.title: Week 3–4 — LLM/RAG Taste Test (DocChat)
docs.text:
• Ingest→chunk→embed→retrieve→answer with sources; FastAPI /ask + minimal UI.
  • Log p50/p95 latency, token counts; faithfulness checklist.
  • Goal: p95 ≤ 1.2 s; demo video; README diagram.

docs.title: Week 5–6 — Recsys Taste Test (Mini-Recsys)
docs.text:
• Baselines + MF + ANN; offline eval precision/recall/nDCG@k.
  • API with algo toggle; demo + README.
  • Goal: nDCG@10 beats popularity by ≥ 0.05.

docs.title: Week 7 — Vision Wildcard (e-com)
docs.text:
• Pick one: quality scoring / near-duplicates / color palette clustering.
  • CLI + API; throughput report; 30-sample QA sheet.

docs.title: 12-Month Track (after choice)
docs.text:
• RAG/Search: hybrid retrieval, rerankers, eval suite → multi-tenant SaaS → personalization/A‑B → private connectors + 3 design‑partners.
  • Recsys: candidate gen + ranker → personalization/cold start → real‑time features/bandits → SaaS + case studies.
  • Vision (optional): high‑leverage e‑com tasks with clear ROI.

Cadence & KPIs: Weekly feature + demo + post. Monthly longform + metric win. Quarterly talk + OSS PR.

docs.title: Daily (7:30–9:00 AM)
docs.text:
• [ ] Pull latest; pick one task from ROADMAP.
  • [ ] Write/update a tiny test.
  • [ ] Implement minimally; pytest -q.
  • [ ] Log metrics to README or CSV.
  • [ ] Commit with a metric in the message.

docs.title: Friday Publish (9–10 PM)
docs.text:
• [ ] Record ≤60 s demo.
  • [ ] Update README with metric changes.
  • [ ] Post on LinkedIn/GitHub; add link to docs/links.md.

docs.title: Demo Readiness
docs.text:
• [ ] Clear problem statement.
  • [ ] One-screen diagram.
  • [ ] Repro steps.
  • [ ] Metrics: p95 / accuracy / nDCG / throughput.

docs.title: RAG Quality
docs.text:
• [ ] Cited sources.
  • [ ] Context overlap threshold met.
  • [ ] Faithfulness checklist passed.

docs.title: Recsys Eval
docs.text:
• [ ] Baseline established.
  • [ ] precision/recall/nDCG@k reported.
  • [ ] Candidate gen vs. ranker compared.

docs.title: Code Quality
docs.text:
• [ ] CI green, lint clean, formatted.
  • [ ] Helper tests exist.

docs.title: Customer Discovery (monthly, 3 calls)
docs.text:
• [ ] Problem, pain points, success metric.
  • [ ] Notes in templates/customer_interview_notes.md.
